name: carnetsalud-network
description: Modelado del proceso de emisión y consulta de un carnet de salud

scripts.composer-network-start: composer network start --networkName carnetsalud-network --networkVersion 0.0.6 --networkAdmin admin --networkAdminEnrollSecret adminpw --card PeerAdmin@hlfv1 --file networkadmin.card
scripts.poc-teardown: ~/opt/fabric-dev-servers/teardownFabric.sh && composer card delete --card admin@carnetsalud-network && yes | docker volume prune
scripts.poc-up: npm run hlf-up && npm run composer-archive-create && npm run composer-network-install && npm run composer-network-start && npm run composer-card-import && npm run composer-network-ping
scripts.poc-upgrade: npm run composer-archive-create && npm run composer-network-install && npm run composer-network-upgrade && npm run composer-network-ping

author: Franklin Gómez
